job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding the business context and aligning technical offerings with strategic objectives.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the ability to bridge the gap between business objectives and technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: identify solutions that meet customers' business needs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights understanding customer business requirements and mapping them to solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: align our offerings to meet customer goals effectively
job_tasks.justification: This demonstrates the need to understand customer goals and position offerings accordingly.
This points to understanding and facilitating broader business transformation initiatives.

job_tasks.phrase: Gather and share customer feedback internally to advocate for their needs and influence GitHub's product roadmap.
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding customer needs and providing input that influences product development, linking business needs to technical output.

job_tasks.phrase: integrating broader industry trends (e.g., AI, DevSecOps) and tools into tailored customer scenarios
job_tasks.justification: While not directly building models, it involves understanding and applying AI concepts within customer scenarios, suggesting a level of technical engagement with AI trends.
This implies understanding the technical aspects of the product to address potential customer concerns during the sales process.

job_tasks.phrase: creative address pain points in a customer's SDLC
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) and proposing solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Own all technical aspects of the sales cycle, from discovery to qualification to proof-of-concept design/execution
job_tasks.justification: This clearly indicates involvement in the technical design and execution of solutions within a sales context.

job_tasks.phrase: guide customers through complex technical scenarios
job_tasks.justification: This requires a deep understanding of technical challenges and how to navigate them.

job_tasks.phrase: strategic advice on secure software development practices
job_tasks.justification: This involves providing expertise on technical practices related to secure software development.
Demonstrating products requires a thorough understanding of their technical functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: address customer pain points by leveraging a strong understanding of GitHub's extensible platform and integrations
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand the technical platform and its integrations to solve problems.

job_tasks.phrase: accelerate customer adoption and integration of GitHub's solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves technical guidance for integrating solutions into customer environments.

job_tasks.phrase: communicating customer's technical goals to guide post-sales teams
job_tasks.justification: This requires understanding and conveying technical goals to other teams for successful implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the creation of technical content for marketing initiatives
job_tasks.justification: This involves producing technical documentation or content for promotional purposes.

job_tasks.phrase: actively participate as a speaker at industry events and conferences, showcasing GitHub's capabilities and sharing best practices
job_tasks.justification: This requires presenting technical capabilities and best practices to an audience.

soft_skills.phrase: Build joint strategies with enterprise sales, customer success, Field CTO, and product teams
communicate the benefits of embedding DevSecOps and AI
Provide coaching and insights to internal teams
always curious to find new solutions
ambitious and dedicated to solving customers problems
proactively maintain broad knowledge of GitHub's product landscape and solutions
Maintain an up-to-date understanding of GitHub's product landscape, emerging trends in developer tools
Own all technical aspects of the sales cycle

classification.rationale: This role is primarily focused on technical sales support, acting as a Solutions Engineer. While it mentions understanding AI and integrating it into customer scenarios, the core responsibilities revolve around technical sales processes, customer engagement, and product demonstration, rather than direct development, fine-tuning, or deployment of Generative AI models.
